languages.text: "Мастер дисциплины наказала быть в готовности после того, как Кровавая паутина во всеуслышание пригласила вас посетить их храм. С тех пор каждый день ждали вашего прибытия, Лорд-капитан".

traits.locale_text: "Мастер дисциплины наказала быть в готовности после того, как Кровавая паутина во всеуслышание пригласила вас посетить их храм. С тех пор каждый день ждали вашего прибытия, Лорд-капитан".

languages.text: "The Master-at-Arms ordered us to be on standby after the Bloodspun Web openly invited you to visit their temple. We have been awaiting your arrival every day since then, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "Мастер дисциплины наказала быть в готовности после того, как Кровавая паутина во всеуслышание пригласила вас посетить их храм. С тех пор каждый день ждали вашего прибытия, Лорд-капитан".

traits.locale_text: "The Master-at-Arms ordered us to be on standby after the Bloodspun Web openly invited you to visit their temple. We have been awaiting your arrival every day since then, Lord Captain."
"The Master-at-Arms ordered us to be on standby after the Bloodspun Web openly invited you to visit their temple. We have been awaiting your arrival every day since then, Lord Captain."
"The Master-at-Arms ordered us to be on standby after the Bloodspun Web openly invited you to visit their temple. We have been awaiting your arrival every day since then, Lord Captain."
"The Master-at-Arms ordered us to be on standby after the Bloodspun Web openly invited you to visit their temple. We have been awaiting your arrival every day since then, Lord Captain."
"The Master-at-Arms ordered us to be on standby after the Bloodspun Web openly invited you to visit their temple. We have been awaiting your arrival every day since then, Lord Captain."

languages.text: “自从织血罗网公开邀请您参观他们的圣殿之后，戒律大师便命令我们时刻待命。在那之后，我们每天都在等待您的到来，舰长大人。”
languages.original_text: "The Master-at-Arms ordered us to be on standby after the Bloodspun Web openly invited you to visit their temple. We have been awaiting your arrival every day since then, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: “自从织血罗网公开邀请您参观他们的圣殿之后，戒律大师便命令我们时刻待命。在那之后，我们每天都在等待您的到来，舰长大人。”

languages.text: «La maestra de armas ordenó que nos mantuviésemos a la espera después de que la Red Sanguinolenta le invitase expresamente a visitar su templo. Hemos aguardado su llegada todos los días desde entonces, Lord Capitán».
languages.original_text: "The Master-at-Arms ordered us to be on standby after the Bloodspun Web openly invited you to visit their temple. We have been awaiting your arrival every day since then, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: «La maestra de armas ordenó que nos mantuviésemos a la espera después de que la Red Sanguinolenta le invitase expresamente a visitar su templo. Hemos aguardado su llegada todos los días desde entonces, Lord Capitán».

languages.text: 「ブラッドスパン・ウェブが公然とあなた方を彼らの神殿へ招いた後、マスター・アット・アームは我々に待機するよう命じました。それ以来、毎日あなたの到着を待っていたのですよ、ロード・キャプテン」
languages.original_text: "The Master-at-Arms ordered us to be on standby after the Bloodspun Web openly invited you to visit their temple. We have been awaiting your arrival every day since then, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: 「ブラッドスパン・ウェブが公然とあなた方を彼らの神殿へ招いた後、マスター・アット・アームは我々に待機するよう命じました。それ以来、毎日あなたの到着を待っていたのですよ、ロード・キャプテン」

languages.text: "Die Waffenmeisterin hat uns in Bereitschaft versetzt, nachdem Euch das Blutgesponnene Netz offen in seinen Tempel eingeladen hatte. Wir haben seit diesem Tag auf Euer Eintreffen gewartet, Lord Captain."
languages.original_text: "The Master-at-Arms ordered us to be on standby after the Bloodspun Web openly invited you to visit their temple. We have been awaiting your arrival every day since then, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: "Die Waffenmeisterin hat uns in Bereitschaft versetzt, nachdem Euch das Blutgesponnene Netz offen in seinen Tempel eingeladen hatte. Wir haben seit diesem Tag auf Euer Eintreffen gewartet, Lord Captain."

languages.text: « La capitaine d'armes nous a ordonné de nous tenir prêts lorsque la Toile de Sang vous a officiellement {mf|invité|invitée} à visiter son temple et depuis lors, nous n'avons pas cessé de guetter votre venue. »
languages.original_text: "The Master-at-Arms ordered us to be on standby after the Bloodspun Web openly invited you to visit their temple. We have been awaiting your arrival every day since then, Lord Captain."

traits.locale_text: « La capitaine d'armes nous a ordonné de nous tenir prêts lorsque la Toile de Sang vous a officiellement {mf|invité|invitée} à visiter son temple et depuis lors, nous n'avons pas cessé de guetter votre venue. »

languages.text: "Silahtar, Kanipi Ağı tarafından tapınaklarını ziyaret etmeniz için açıkça davet edilmeniz üzerine hazır olmam talimatını verdi. O günden beri gelişinizi bekliyorduk Lord Kaptan."
languages.original_text: "The Master-at-Arms ordered us to be on standby after the Bloodspun Web openly invited you to visit their temple. We have been awaiting your arrival every day since then, Lord Captain."
